body: FWIW, I have a branch that implements this. It's a bit tangled up with other things but I'll get it submitted in early 1.6 I hope. One detail that isn't noted is that you can't always translate R_ADDRPOWER to a R_PPC_ADDR16_HA / R_PPC_ADDR16_LO pair, sometimes it has to be R_PPC64_ADDR16_LO_DS because it is applied to loads as well as addi, and a few loads (lwa, for example) are DS form.
